mapper.update: UPDATE sec_reservation SET price_time = now(),price_type=#{priceType} WHERE order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.select: select sr.id,ho.id as orderId,ho.order_name,ho.order_num,ho.pay_money,ho.status,sda.appointment_time,sdat.timeframe,hospital_name,sd.name as doctorName from sec_reservation sr left JOIN sec_hospital sh on sr.hospital_id = sh.id left JOIN sec_doctor sd on sr.doctor_id = sd.id left JOIN his_order ho on sr.order_id = ho.id left JOIN sec_doctor_appointmenttime_timeframe sdat on sr.timeframe_id = sdat.id left JOIN sec_doctor_appointmenttime sda on sdat.appointmenttime_id = sda.id where sr.patient_id = #{patientId} AND ho.status = 0
